definition: fine ceramics (used for dental implants, synthetic bones, electronics, knife blades etc)/advanced ceramics/engineered ceramics

sentences.english: Jiangnan porcelain place, nature has a strong tea.
sentences.chinese: 江南有陶瓷的地方，自然有着浓郁的茶香。

sentences.english: The headquarters favor located at Tangshan reach the ceramic city, the staff total nearly ten thousand people.
sentences.chinese: 总部位于唐山惠达陶瓷城，员工总数近万人。

sentences.english: In the process of Sun Chao's research of crystal, he has produced porcelain typical of different dynasties.
sentences.chinese: 孙超研究结晶来由过程中，烧出的历代陶瓷。

sentences.english: Ceramic restorative material is the best living substitutive material for natural tooth.
sentences.chinese: 陶瓷修复材料是最自然逼真的牙体组织人工替代材料。

sentences.english: The ceramic tablewares have a bearing on human body.
sentences.chinese: 陶瓷食具是盛放食物的容器，与人体健康休戚相关。

sentences.english: Generally speaking, ceramics product can is classified into two categories: practical and artistic.
sentences.chinese: 一般来说，陶瓷产品可以分为两类，即。

sentences.english: Gani ceramics, let the ceramic glorifies life!
sentences.chinese: 简一陶瓷，让瓷砖赞美生活。

sentences.english: The generator represents magnetron, packaged with constants and electromagnets(2 coils magnetic) in the magnetic-shielded ceramic-metal execution.
sentences.chinese: 该磁控管的设计采用电磁石，封装采用金属陶瓷。

sentences.english: Porous ceramics is a kind of inorganic non-metal material that mostly includes pores.
sentences.chinese: 多孔陶瓷是一类以气孔为主相的无机非金属材料。

sentences.english: The current status of transparent ceramic and some of the important scintillator properties are summarized in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 概述了透明陶瓷的研究现状及闪烁体的一些重要性能。

sentences.english: The room and high temperature mechanical strength of the hot-pressed B4C ceramic are studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了热压烧结B4C陶瓷的室温和高温力学强度。

sentences.english: It is sometimes used as a substitute for feldspars in the manufacture of glass and ceramics.
sentences.chinese: 在玻璃和陶瓷制造中有时用来作长石的代用品。

sentences.english: The platforms are operated using Advanced Ceramics Research’s integrated ground station.
sentences.chinese: 该平台采用先进陶瓷研究公司的综合地面站运作。

sentences.english: Porcelain, theme song of the ad "MOTO" cell phone in 1998.
sentences.chinese: “陶瓷”，1998年摩托罗拉手机广告歌。

sentences.english: Compressing the bottom of a ceramic olive oil bottle eliminates S cracks.
sentences.chinese: 压缩了陶瓷橄榄油瓶底部裂缝消除S。

sentences.english: The changes of Chinese ancient bowl bottom is the epitome of the whole ancient ceramic history.
sentences.chinese: 碗底足的变迁是整个古陶瓷历史变迁的一个缩影。

definition: jade/jade and stone/(fig.) the good and the bad
a type of clay found in the region of Yixing 宜興|宜兴[Yi2 xing1], used to make Yixing stoneware, with its distinctive russet or dark purple coloring
